headline: SocGen Cuts SLB N.V. (SLB) Price Target But Asserts ‘Outperform’ Rating
summary: SLB N.V. (NYSE:SLB) is one of the most profitable energy stocks to buy right now. On October 10, SocGen analyst Guillaume Delaby reiterated an ‘Outperform’ rating on the stock but cut the price target to $47.60 from $63. The price target cut comes amid concerns that the company will pay a price for the slow […]

headline: SLB (SLB) Margin Decline Tests Bullish Narratives as Profitability Narrows and Growth Trails Market
summary: SLB (SLB) reported a net profit margin of 11.5%, down from 12.6% in the prior year, while its earnings are expected to grow at 5.49% per year. Revenue is projected to rise at 3.2% annually, lagging the broader US market’s anticipated 10.1% pace. With shares currently trading at $32.63, well below the estimated fair value of $70.08, investors are weighing the slowdown in growth and narrowing margins against the company’s attractive valuation and track record of moving to profitability. See our...
